text: The 1948 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles was the 15th edition of the women's singles championship. Gizi Farkas defeated Vera Thomas- Dace in the final by three sets to two, to win the title. ==Results== \+ Match replayed after time limit rule inconsistencies (original score was Farkas winning 13-21 9-21 21-9 21-18 29-27) ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== \- Category:1948 in women's table tennis
title: 1948 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles
